statements: CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_type TEXT, location TEXT, status TEXT)
CREATE TABLE readings (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, value FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE smart_streetlights (id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50), brightness INT);
CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras (camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), camera_type VARCHAR(50), status VARCHAR(50);
CREATE TABLE weather_sensors (sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), temperature FLOAT, humidity FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, order_date DATE, user_id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id) )
CREATE TABLE example_table1 (column1 TYPE1 PRIMARY KEY, column2 TYPE2, column3 TYPE3, column4 TYPE4)
CREATE TABLE example_table2 (column1 TYPE1 PRIMARY KEY, column2 TYPE2 REFERENCES example_table1(column1), column3 TYPE3, column4 TYPE4)
CREATE TABLE example_table3 (column1 TYPE1 PRIMARY KEY, column2 TYPE2 REFERENCES example_table2(column1), column3 TYPE3, column4 TYPE4)
